comment._content: A biography of Philander Knox starts around page 854 of History of Pittsburgh and Environs, from Prehistoric Days to the Beginning of the American Revolution ... by George Thornton Fleming, American Historical Society, 1922 books.google.com/books?id=k_kMAAAAYAAJ&pg=PA854&l... She is the former Lillie Smith.
